body_html:
Sorry, but we can't support Android.mk based builds of TF. Bazel, Makefile, and to some extent cmake are the supported options for Android. You may be able to find the assistance you need over at StackOverflow.

That said, might be worth checking out #4680 and also bazelbuild/bazel#2638 to see if any of the workarounds apply at all.
body_text:
Sorry, but we can't support Android.mk based builds of TF. Bazel, Makefile, and to some extent cmake are the supported options for Android. You may be able to find the assistance you need over at StackOverflow.
That said, might be worth checking out #4680 and also bazelbuild/bazel#2638 to see if any of the workarounds apply at all.
body:
Sorry, but we can't support Android.mk based builds of TF. Bazel, Makefile, and to some extent cmake are the supported options for Android. You may be able to find the assistance you need over at StackOverflow.

That said, might be worth checking out #4680 and also https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/2638 to see if any of the workarounds apply at all.
